rooms.description: You are currently in the hallway. The room is dark and there is a flashlight on the ground. You see a light at the end of the hallway leading to the second room, which is north. You can either take flashlight or go north.
You are currently in the kitchen. There is a key on the table and a door with a lock leading to another room, which is east. You can either take key or go east.
You are currently in the closet. There is a knife on the shelf and you hear a noise in the corner.
